plot: The Solo ship and its crew continue to battle against the Buff Clan leading to the final battle that will determine the fate of all life in the universe
title: Densetsu-kyoshin ideon: Sesshoku-hen
plot_es: The Solo ship and its crew continue to battle against the Buff Clan leading to the final battle that will determine the fate of all life in the universe
plot_en: The Solo ship and its crew continue to battle against the Buff Clan leading to the final battle that will determine the fate of all life in the universe
